Stealth.help: You blend into your environment and can only be seen at very close range. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense from all attacks. If, however, you attack while using this power, you will be discovered and will lose your Stealth and some of your Defense bonus. Stealth will not work with any other form of Concealment power such as Shadow Fall or Steamy Mist. Very low Endurance cost.

Grant_Invisibility.help: Grants a targeted teammate or leaguemate Invisibility. The Invisibility lasts about 2 minutes. While your ally is Invisible, he probably will not be detected unless he attacks a target. If he attacks, he is still hard to see and maintains some bonus to Defense to all attacks. This power works with other Concealment related powers.
Grant_Invisibility.targetHelp: You have been turned Invisible. You are difficult to detect, and have a bonus to Defense to all attacks.

Invisibility.help: You can bend light around yourself to become Invisible. While this power is active, you are almost impossible to detect. If, however, you attack while using this power, you will be discovered and will lose your Stealth and Defense bonus provided by this power. This power will not work with other self affecting Concealment related powers such as Stealth or Shadow Fall. Purchasing Invisibility requires the user to be level 14 and possess Stealth or Grant Invisibility.

Phase_Shift.help: You can Phase Shift to become out of sync with normal space. Although you do not become completely Invisible, you are translucent and hard to see. You are intangible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space. Although this power is a toggle, you cannot remain Phase Shifted for more than 30 seconds, even if you still have Endurance. Cannot be used with Rest. You must be at least level 14 and have two other Concealment Powers before selecting Phase Shift.
Phase_Shift.attackerHit: You Phase Shift out of normal space. You are now intangible, are hard to see, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space.

Misdirection.help: You redirect the anger of enemies around you, placating them. This causes them to break off their attacks. The momentary lack of awareness this causes also leads to reduced resistance to damage for a short time. You must be at least level 14 and have trained any two other Concealment powers before you can train this power. Recharge: Very Long
Misdirection.targetHelp: You have been placated and your damage resistance has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You redirect the anger of {PlayerDest}, placating them. This induces a momentary lack of awareness that also reduces their resistance to damage.
messages.victimHit: You have been placated by {PowerName} and are unable to target {PlayerSource}. Your resistance to damage has also been reduced.

messages.victimHit: You have been placated by {PowerName} and are unable to target {PlayerSource}. Your resistance to damage has also been reduced.
